hero.title: Analyze SHNQ, GOST and construction rules in seconds
hero.description: An AI assistant built specifically for professionals. Ask your question and get the relevant chapter and clause with sources.
hero.card.title: Smart Chat
hero.card.a1: I search the SHNQ knowledge base, find matching chapters and clauses, and return an answer with sources.
home.description: Analyze SHNQ, GOST, and QMQ norms in real time with AI. Get relevant clauses with source references.
home.chat.demo.bot_hello: Hello! I can answer your questions about SHNQ and GOST standards. How can I help?
home.chat.demo.user_question: Which standard governs the installation of safety signs?
home.chat.demo.bot_answer: It is installed in accordance with GOST ISO 3864-1-2013. The sign's shape, color, and dimensions are defined in this standard.
chat.welcome: Hello! SHNQ AI assistant helps you with urban planning standards. Type your question below.
